data.title: Sakhalin, RU Climate Zone, Monthly Weather Averages and Historical Data
data.meta_description: Climate of Sakhalin, Russia. Information regarding Sakhalin climate zones and historical climate data including temperature and precipitation.
data.text:
Sakhalin, Russia Climate

Weather: 19.12°C/66.42°F, Wind SW at 1.28 km/h, 44% Humidity, 0% Chance of rain

Sakhalin Climate Summary

Located at an elevation of 398.59 meters (1307.71 feet) above sea level, Sakhalin has a Subartic, severe winter, no dry season, cool summer climate (Classification: Dfc). The city’s yearly temperature is 1.21ºC (34.18ºF) and it is -4.06% lower than Russia’s averages. Sakhalin typically receives about 98.26 millimeters (3.87 inches) of precipitation and has 179.11 rainy days (49.07% of the time) annually.
